price: Elle dit : “Ô notables ! Donnez-moi votre avis sur cette affaire: je ne déciderai rien sans que vous ne soyez présents (pour me conseiller).”
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
